item.description:
Sandy Kulman, Director Pacific Northwest Meditation Center, will be facilitating.

The key ingredient to any relationship is love. When we lose that insight, it leaves us feeling misunderstood and disconnected. In this interactive program, you will discover what keeps us from truly loving one another. Meditation reconnects you with the love already inside you. Learn how the power of that love can heal all the relationships in your life.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Meditation: The Secret to Loving Relationships
